column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We really enjoyed our experience at Bavette's. We accidentally came in the night before our reservation
column2: but the hostess kindly told us she could seat us within the hour
column3: so we went for a drink at the bar. Once seated
column4: our waiter was super friendly and attentive
column5: and all the food we ordered was delicious. Despite being a steakhouse
column6: I highly recommend the fried chicken...perfectly crispy and tender. Drinks were strong and tasty. Overall
column8: but I am only giving 4 stars because I wouldn't say there was anything particularly memorable or exciting about Bavette's compared to other "nice" restaurants around the city.
